apps.localizedDescription:
Adds new features to YouTube:

â€¢ Download and save videos up to 4k resolution
â€¢ Save videos as audio only
â€¢ View, manage and share all your downloads in Cercube's download manager
â€¢ Block ads
â€¢ Share downloaded videos with other devices via AirDrop
â€¢ Background playback for streamed and downloaded videos
â€¢ Import downloads to Music or Videos
â€¢ Play YouTube videos using Picture-in-Picture mode

permissions.usageDescription: This lets you upload videos you've already created.
Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.
This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.
Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.
